text: 🧑‍💻 Computer Science Student at FCSE | Programming Enthusiast | Passionate about Technology
🎓 Pursuing excellence in Computer Science at FCSE, with a perfect record of 15 out of 15 courses passed with top marks.

👨‍💻 Proficient in a variety of programming languages and paradigms via 10/10 grade, including: Structured Programming (C), Object-Oriented Programming (C++), Advanced Programming (Advanced Java), Internet Programming (JavaScript), UI Design (jQuery), Algorithms and Data Structures (Java)

🚀 Eager to apply my knowledge and skills to real-world projects and collaborations. Currently, I'm immersed in the exciting realms of AI and ML, deepening my knowledge and skills in these dynamic fields.
🌐 Let's connect and explore opportunities to learn, grow, and make meaningful contributions to the tech industry together!

Also an Experienced Computer Technician with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Problem-solving, Computer repair, Software Installation, Printer Support, and Computer Maintenance.
